chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (X : Type) (S : Family X) (J : Type) (V : J -> Ensemble X), FiniteT J -> (forall j : J, In S (V j)) -> In (finite_intersections S) (IndexedIntersection V)

Premises:
Inductive finite_intersections (X : Type) (S : Family X) : Family X := intro_full : In (finite_intersections S) Full_set | intro_S : forall U : Ensemble X, In S U -> In (finite_intersections S) U | intro_intersection : forall U V : Ensemble X, In (finite_intersections S) U -> In (finite_intersections S) V -> In (finite_intersections S) (Intersection U V) Arguments finite_intersections {X}%type_scope Arguments intro_full {X}%type_scope Arguments intro_S {X}%type_scope Arguments intro_intersection {X}%type_scope
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
IndexedIntersection : forall A T : Type, IndexedFamily A T -> Ensemble T
In = fun (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x : U) => A x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop Arguments In {U}%type_scope
Hurkens.Generic.V : forall (U1 : Type) (El1 : U1 -> Type), (forall u : U1, (El1 u -> U1) -> U1) -> ((U1 -> U1) -> U1) -> U1 -> U1
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA
Family = fun T : Type => Ensemble (Ensemble T) : Type -> Type Arguments Family _%type_scope
finite_intersection_is_finite_indexed_intersection : forall (S : Family ?X) (U : Ensemble ?X), In (finite_intersections S) U -> exists J : Type, FiniteT J /\ (exists V : J -> Ensemble ?X, (forall j : J, In S (V j)) /\ U = IndexedIntersection V) where ?X : [ |- Type]
finite_intersections_ind : forall (X : Type) (S : Family X) (P : Ensemble X -> Prop), P Full_set -> (forall U : Ensemble X, In S U -> P U) -> (forall U V : Ensemble X, In (finite_intersections S) U -> P U -> In (finite_intersections S) V -> P V -> P (Intersection U V)) -> forall e : Ensemble X, finite_intersections S e -> P e
finite_intersections_sind : forall (X : Type) (S : Family X) (P : Ensemble X -> SProp), P Full_set -> (forall U : Ensemble X, In S U -> P U) -> (forall U V : Ensemble X, In (finite_intersections S) U -> P U -> In (finite_intersections S) V -> P V -> P (Intersection U V)) -> forall e : Ensemble X, finite_intersections S e -> P e
intro_intersection : forall (S : Family ?X) (U V : Ensemble ?X), In (finite_intersections S) U -> In (finite_intersections S) V -> In (finite_intersections S) (Intersection U V) where ?X : [ |- Type]
intro_S : forall (S : Family ?X) (U : Ensemble ?X), In S U -> In (finite_intersections S) U where ?X : [ |- Type]
injection_preserves_cardinal : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (n : nat) (S : Ensemble X), cardinal X S n -> injective f -> cardinal Y (Im S f) n
FamilyUnion_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
FamilyUnion_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyUnion F t -> P t
family_union_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x
unique_FiniteT_nat_cardinal : exists ! f : forall X : Type, FiniteT X -> nat, f False empty_finite = 0%nat /\ (forall (X : Type) (H : FiniteT X), f (option X) (add_finite X H) = S (f X H)) /\ (forall (X Y : Type) (H : FiniteT X) (g : X -> Y) (Hinv : invertible g), f Y (bij_finite X Y g H Hinv) = f X H)
Countable = fun (X : Type) (S : Ensemble X) => CountableT {x : X | In S x} : forall X : Type, Ensemble X -> Prop Arguments Countable {X}%type_scope
finite_inj_surj : forall (X : Type) (f : X -> X), FiniteT X -> injective f -> surjective f
finite_surj_inj : forall (X : Type) (f : X -> X), FiniteT X -> surjective f -> injective f
FiniteT_nat_cardinal_option : forall (X : Type) (H : FiniteT X), FiniteT_nat_cardinal (option X) (add_finite X H) = S (FiniteT_nat_cardinal X H)
family_intersection_intro : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (x : T), (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x
FamilyIntersection_sind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> SProp), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
FamilyIntersection_ind : forall (T : Type) (F : Family T) (P : T -> Prop), (forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> P x) -> forall t : T, FamilyIntersection F t -> P t
intro_full : forall S : Family ?X, In (finite_intersections S) Full_set where ?X : [ |- Type]
Inductive FamilyUnion (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_union_intro : forall (S : Ensemble T) (x : T), In F S -> In S x -> In (FamilyUnion F) x Arguments FamilyUnion [T]%type_scope Arguments family_union_intro [T]%type_scope
Inductive FamilyIntersection (T : Type) (F : Family T) : Ensemble T := family_intersection_intro : forall x : T, (forall S : Ensemble T, In F S -> In S x) -> In (FamilyIntersection F) x Arguments FamilyIntersection [T]%type_scope Arguments family_intersection_intro [T]%type_scope _ [x] _%function_scope
Im_sind : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (P : V -> SProp), (forall x : U, In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> P y) -> forall v : V, Im X f v -> P v
Im_ind : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (P : V -> Prop), (forall x : U, In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> P y) -> forall v : V, Im X f v -> P v
Im_intro : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (x : U), In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In (Im X f) y
G_aux : forall (U : Type) (P : Ensemble U -> Prop), (forall X : Ensemble U, Finite U X -> (forall Y : Ensemble U, Strict_Included Y X -> P Y) -> P X) -> P Empty_set
FiniteT_nat_cardinal_cond : forall (X : Type) (H : FiniteT X) (n : nat), cardinal X Full_set n -> FiniteT_nat_cardinal X H = n
CSB.CSB : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (g : Y -> X), injective f -> injective g -> exists h : X -> Y, bijective h
bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y
indexed_intersection_intro : forall (A T : Type) (F : IndexedFamily A T) (x : T), (forall a : A, In (F a) x) -> In (IndexedIntersection F) x
FiniteT_sind : forall P : Type -> SProp, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
FiniteT_ind : forall P : Type -> Prop, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
